Exercises: Floor-to-Stand Practice (4x4-6) PRIMARY - use one knee assist as needed, Deep Bodyweight Squats (3x12), Walking Lunges (3x10 each leg), Bulgarian Split Squats (3x8 each leg), Glute Bridges (3x15 hold 2sec), Turkish Get-Up Practice assisted (3 each side)
Notes: Practice floor-to-stand movement pattern. Build single-leg strength. Progress by reducing assistance

Exercises: Brisk Walking (45 min), Hand Exercises (5 min: finger stretches 10x, fist clenches 10x, wrist circles 10 each way, thumb touches 3x), Dynamic Stretching (10 min)
Notes: Target HR: 60-70% max (97-113 bpm). Hand exercises can be done during walking breaks

Exercises: Hand Warm-Up (3 min: stretches and wrist circles), Push-ups (3x10-12), Resistance Band Rows (3x15), Dumbbell Shoulder Press (3x10), Hand Strengthening 3 sets (stress ball squeezes 15, finger extensions 15, wrist curls 12 each way), Core & Hip Circuit 4 rounds (Bird Dogs 10 each, Dead Bugs 10 each, Hip Flexor Stretch 30sec, Deep Squat Hold 30sec), Floor Transitions (3x4)
Equipment Needed: Dumbbells (5-15 lbs), Resistance bands, Yoga mat, Stress ball
Notes: Warm up hands before gripping weights. Grip strength declines with age - train regularly

Exercises: Easy Walking (20 min), Hand Therapy Session (10 min: warm hands, finger stretches 10sec each, wrist stretches 30sec, finger spreads 10x, prayer stretch 30sec, reverse prayer 30sec, gentle ball squeezes 20), Floor Yoga/Stretching (30 min: hips, shoulders, hamstrings, wrists)
Equipment Needed: Yoga mat, Stress ball, Warm water bowl (optional)
Notes: Hand stiffness often worse in morning - gentle movement helps. Perfect day for hand therapy

Exercises: Floor-to-Stand Practice (4x4-6) PRIMARY, Goblet Squats deep (3x12), Pistol Squat Progressions assisted (3x5 each leg), Step-ups explosive (3x10 each leg), Single-Leg RDLs (3x10 each leg), Kneeling-to-Standing (3x6)
Equipment Needed: Dumbbells (10-20 lbs), Stairs, Yoga mat, TRX/doorframe
Notes: Single-leg strength critical. Kneeling-to-standing is key progression toward goal

Exercises: Interval Walking (25 min: 2 min brisk/1 min easy), Floor-to-Stand Practice (3x4) lighter volume, Balance Work (15 min: single-leg stands 30sec, eyes closed 15sec, reaching), Floor Mobility (10 min: various floor transitions, deep squats), Stretch (10 min)
Notes: Practice getting down and up from floor various ways. Balance and mobility interconnected

Exercises: Complete rest or optional gentle 15-20 min walk. Optional: 5-min gentle hand stretches if stiff
Notes: Recovery essential. Can do light hand stretches anytime without impacting recovery
